messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:microscopes
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the responses on microscopes everyone! Kristen ... From: sharonashleigh@webtv.net To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, May 17,
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for all the responses on microscopes everyone!

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: sharonashleigh@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, May 17, 2003 9:33 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:microscopes


Try looking at www.hometrainingtool.com.
They have a few microscopes, ranging in sizes - pocket size, etc and
offer low and high powered styles. I have been admiring them myself!
:) Sharon
